# Raft 日志复制测试

# 基本日志复制
log_replication \
leader=1 \
followers=(2,3,4,5) \
entries=(cmd1,cmd2,cmd3) \
term=2
----
success=true
replicated=4
term=2

# 多行输出测试
detailed_replication \
leader=3 \
followers=(1,2,4,5) \
entries=(set x=5, set y=10, set z=15)
----
----
leader: 3
followers: [1, 2, 4, 5]
entries: [set x=5, set y=10, set z=15]
term: 2
replication_status: success
replicated_count: 4
----
----

# 网络分区期间的日志复制
partitioned_replication \
leader=1 \
available_followers=(2,3) \
unreachable_followers=(4,5) \
entries=(update_a,update_b)
----
success=true
replicated=2
failed=3
quorum_achieved=true
partial_replication=true

# 日志冲突解决
log_conflict \
leader=1 \
conflicting_term=3 \
current_term=5 \
entries=(old_entry,new_entry)
----
conflict_detected=true
conflict_term=3
current_term=5
entries_replaced=true
new_entries=[old_entry, new_entry]
resolution=success
